about_the_game:
Welcome to Citres, the indie city builder where your urban planning skills meet classic puzzle excitement! Dive into a vibrant, low-poly world where cities are not just built; they're crafted with precision, strategy, and creativity. In Citres, every building block contributes to your vision for your city, and every strategic placement paves the way to a bustling metropolitan wonder!

Unique Building Mechanics:

  • Tetris-Inspired Gameplay: Place a variety of Tetris-shaped buildings on your grid. Rotate and position them with care, optimizing space for the best urban layout.
  • Evolve Your City: Combine your buildings! Fit the pieces together in a 3x3 square, and watch them merge into upgraded, high-level buildings, boosting your city's population score and aesthetic appeal.
  • Population Is Power: Grow your population to unlock new building types and special structures, adding diversity and life to your urban expanse.

Strategic Bonuses:

  • Shape Your Destiny: Purchase useful bonuses to get the edge you need. Select desired shapes, replace existing buildings, and more to overcome urban obstacles and maximize your city's potential.
  • Resource Management: Balance your income and expenses as you invest in bonuses, ensuring your city continues to thrive without going bankrupt.

Minimalistic, Low-Poly Art Style:

  • Stylish Simplicity: Citres embraces a minimalistic, low-poly design that's easy on the eyes but full of visual charm. Watch as your colorful city expands, with each unique building adding to a harmonious and stylish skyline.
  • Dynamic Environments: Experience the lively ambiance of your city through subtle animations and calming soundscapes, enhancing the tranquil yet engaging gameplay.
